ygData.subject: The End of Liono Convoy Chapter of the BeastWars
ygData.msgSnippet: As the 5 warriors head towards the East A female voice calls out hey Liono how are you going to leave not say good-bye to your fiance Liono Eyes grow wide

Subject: The End of Liono Convoy Chapter of the BeastWars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From: RgDaN@...

As the 5 warriors head towards the East

A female voice "calls out hey Liono how are you going to leave not say 
good-bye to your fiance"

Liono Eyes grow wide with shock "Key and Fiance where that come from."

Key stops right behind Liono "Well maybe someday. You told me to stand like 
this" she hold up her arms "So you would have a home to return to now I need 
a home to return to everyday."

Liono Smiles and hugs key "I love you We are a team now and forever. "

Key smiles "You once said once you start pressing forward you won't have time 
to look back and protect me and for this point on I'm watching your back." As 
she shutter as cold breeze blow in.

Liono Spreads his wings to cover her from the chill.

Key looks at Liono "Where are we going?"

Liono looks at the Blue ball "It can wait this time let go wherever you want?"

Key looks at the stars as they all walk down the path "The Tropics! Liono I 
have something to tell you."  

Liono thinks about the last time she said that "This time I'm not going 
anywhere."

As key gently kisses him.

As the six warriors walk down the path east.

Liono thinks so this is how my journey ends for now Life is really a road and 
I'm going to keep going. As for the Scores I have to settle they don't matter 
the past is unimportant but the future and present is all we have to shape 
and mold.

((So end Liono's Chapter in the BeastWars If needed he will appear but until 
then lets just call it Happy Ever After. Good-bye Everyone ))
